title: NEW SUMMER SPECIAL Spacious Townhomes Tour Today
posting_body: ['678 Bellflower, managed by Sack Management Inc', '678 Bellflower Avenue', 'Sunnyvale, CA 94086', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Our apartment homes at 678 Bellflower have been thoughtfully redesigned with new kitchen cabinetry, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, modern flooring, and ample storage.', 'Call or visit us today!', 'This two story apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, coat closet, pantry, washer/dryer, living and dining areas, and a patio on the main level.', 'The second level is home to two bedrooms, linen closet, and a balcony!', 'This apartment requires a $600 deposit.', 'Apartment Features', '* Private Balcony', '* Dishwasher', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', '* Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Full sized Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Disposal', '* Walk-in Closet', '* Ceiling Fan', '* Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher & Electric Stove', '* Air Conditioning', '* Private Patio', '* Microwave', '* Refrigerator', '* Electric Stove', '* Wood-Like Floors', 'Community Features', '* Professionally Managed', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* Non Smoking Community', '* Swimming Pool', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Sun Deck', '* Garage Parking', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More']
